info.title: Hygdra Forecasting API
info.description: API documentation for Hygdra Forecasting System

get.description:
Get a list of all tickers from the defined ticker groups.

Returns:
    List[str]: List of all available ticker symbols.

schema.title: Response Get Ticker List Attribute Ticker List Get

get.description:
Get the names of the ticker clusters.

Returns:
    List[str]: List of cluster names defined in TKGroupName.

schema.title: Response Get Ticker Cluster Names Attribute Ticker Cluster Name Get

get.description:
Get the full ticker cluster mapping.

Returns:
    dict: A dictionary mapping cluster names to their corresponding values.

schema.title: Response Get Ticker Cluster List Attribute Ticker Cluster List Get

get.description:
Get the available sequence requests.

Returns:
    List[str]: List of sequence request names defined in SequenceRequest.

schema.title: Response Get Sequence Requests Attribute Seq Get

get.description: Return the list of Kraken enabled assets previously fetched and stored in enabled_assets.json.

Get the latest DQN action recommendation for a ticker.

Args:
    ticker: Stock ticker (e.g., 'BTC-USD')
    interval: Time interval (days, hours, minutes, thirty)

Returns:
    JSON with action, action_name, confidence, q_values, forecast, current_price

Get latest action recommendations for all tickers at a given interval.

Args:
    interval: Time interval (days, hours, minutes, thirty)

Returns:
    JSON array of action recommendations

Get OHLC (Open, High, Low, Close) data directly from Kraken API.

This endpoint fetches fresh OHLC data from Kraken without going through Redis/scheduler,
making it ideal for candlestick charts that need complete OHLC information.

Args:
    ticker: Stock ticker (e.g., 'BTC-USD', 'ETH-USD')
    interval: Time interval (minutes, thirty, hours, days)

Returns:
    JSON array with Date, open, high, low, close columns

Get list of available tickers with data in Redis.
Scans Redis keys to find all tickers with predictions.

Returns:
    List of dicts with ticker info:
    - symbol: Ticker symbol (e.g., "BTC-USD")
    - name: Asset name (e.g., "Bitcoin")
    - type: Asset type ("crypto", "stock", etc.)
    - intervals: List of available intervals
    - has_dqn: Whether DQN data is available

schema.title: Response Get Available Tickers Api Tickers Available Get

get.description:
Get list of all available intervals across all tickers.

Returns:
    List of interval names (e.g., ["minutes", "hours", "days"])

schema.title: Response Get Available Intervals Api Tickers Intervals Get

get.description:
Get detailed information about a specific ticker.

Args:
    ticker: Ticker symbol (e.g., "BTC-USD")

Returns:
    Dict with ticker details including available intervals, latest price, etc.

schema.title: Response Get Ticker Info Api Tickers  Ticker  Info Get

get.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response List Api Keys Api User Api Keys  Get

post.description: Create a new API key for the authenticated user.

get.description: List all API keys for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response List Api Keys Api User Api Keys Get

patch.description: Update an existing API key (name, role, rate_limit, or is_active).

get.description: Get usage statistics for an API key.

schema.title: Response Get Api Key Usage Api User Api Keys  Key Id  Usage Get

get.description:
MCP root endpoint for Inspector compatibility.
Public endpoint - no authentication required.

Returns:
- protocolVersion: MCP protocol version
- capabilities: Available capabilities
- serverInfo: Server information

List available MCP tools.

Auth:
- Header `X-API-Key: sk_...` or `Authorization: Bearer <JWT>`

Example:
- curl -s "https://<host>/mcp/tools" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."

schema.title: Response List Tools Mcp Tools Get

get.description:
Get price forecast for a specific ticker and interval.

Query params:
- ticker: e.g. BTC-USD
- interval: one of minutes | thirty | hours | days

Example:
- curl -s "https://<host>/mcp/tools/get_stock_forecast?ticker=BTC-USD&interval=hours" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."

schema.title: Response Get Stock Forecast Mcp Tools Get Stock Forecast Get

get.description:
Get DQN action recommendation with confidence.

Query params:
- ticker: e.g. BTC-USD
- interval: minutes | thirty | hours | days

Example:
- curl -s "https://<host>/mcp/tools/get_action_recommendation?ticker=BTC-USD&interval=hours" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."

schema.title: Response Get Action Recommendation Mcp Tools Get Action Recommendation Get

get.description:
Get all available tickers.

Example:
- curl -s "https://<host>/mcp/tools/list_available_tickers" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."

schema.title: Response List Available Tickers Mcp Tools List Available Tickers Get

get.description:
Get model performance metrics.

Query params:
- ticker
- interval

Example:
- curl -s "https://<host>/mcp/tools/get_metrics?ticker=BTC-USD&interval=hours" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."

schema.title: Response Get Metrics Mcp Tools Get Metrics Get

get.description:
Stream real-time forecast updates for a ticker using Server-Sent Events (SSE).

Path params:
- ticker: Stock ticker symbol (e.g., BTC-USD)
- interval: Time interval (minutes, thirty, hours, days)

Example:
- curl -N "https://<host>/mcp/stream/forecast/BTC-USD/hours" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."

Stream real-time action recommendations using Server-Sent Events (SSE).

Example:
- curl -N "https://<host>/mcp/stream/actions/BTC-USD/hours" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."

Stream real-time model metrics using Server-Sent Events (SSE).

Example:
- curl -N "https://<host>/mcp/stream/metrics/BTC-USD/hours" -H "X-API-Key: sk_..."
Get user preferences. Creates default preferences if they don't exist.

put.description: Update user preferences. Only updates provided fields.

post.description: Reset user preferences to default values.

get.description: Get user notifications with pagination and filtering.

schema.title: Response Get Notifications Api User Notifications  Get

post.description: Create a new notification for the user (for testing/system use).

get.description: Get count of unread notifications.

patch.description: Mark a specific notification as read.
Mark all notifications as read for the user.

Mark a notification as resolved (read + action taken).
Called when user interacts with a notification.

post.description: Log a new user session (called on login).

get.description: Get user's recent sessions.

schema.title: Response Get User Sessions Api User Sessions  Get

delete.description: Revoke a specific session (delete from database).

post.description: Verify Ethereum signature and create/authenticate user.
Verify Solana signature and create/authenticate user.

get.description: Get a message template for Ethereum signing.
Get a message template for Solana signing.

schema.title: Response Get Notification Settings Api User Notification Settings  Get
Response Update Notification Settings Api User Notification Settings  Put
Response Get Notification Settings Api User Notification Settings Get
Response Update Notification Settings Api User Notification Settings Put

get.description: Get current authenticated user's complete profile information.

schema.title: Response Get Current User Info Api User Me Get
Response Update User Preferences Api User Preferences Put

post.description:
Record user login (update last_login_at and increment login_count).
Call this after successful authentication.

get.description: Get user profile from profiles table.

Get all portfolios for the authenticated user.
Auto-creates a default portfolio if none exist.

schema.title: Response Get User Portfolios Api Portfolios  Get

post.description: Create a new portfolio for the authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Create Portfolio Api Portfolios  Post

get.description: Get detailed portfolio information including positions.

schema.title: Response Get Portfolio Details Api Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Get
Response Get Portfolio Default Pairs Api Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Default Pairs Get
Response Set Portfolio Default Pairs Api Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Default Pairs Put

post.description:
Execute a trade based on DQN recommendation or manual input.
Uses Supabase to record trade in database.

schema.title: Response Execute Trade Api Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Trades Post

get.description: Get trading history for a portfolio using Supabase.

schema.title: Response Get Portfolio Trades Api Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Trades Get

get.description: Get current positions in a portfolio.

schema.title: Response Get Portfolio Positions Api Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Positions Get

get.description: Get all watchlists for authenticated user.

schema.title: Response Get User Watchlists Api Watchlists  Get
Response Create Watchlist Api Watchlists  Post

get.description: Get all tickers in a watchlist.

schema.title: Response Get Watchlist Items Api Watchlists  Watchlist Id  Items Get

post.description: Add ticker to watchlist using Supabase.

schema.title: Response Add Watchlist Item Api Watchlists  Watchlist Id  Items Post
Response Sell Position Api Paper Positions  Position Id  Sell Post
Response Disable Strategy Api Paper Strategies  Strategy Id  Disable Post

get.description: Calculate portfolio statistics: initial investment, total sold, percent change.

schema.title: Response Get Portfolio Stats Api Paper Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Stats Get

get.description:
List paper trading portfolios for the authenticated user.
Enforces one default test portfolio and auto-creates it if missing.

schema.title: Response List Paper Portfolios Api Paper Portfolios Get

post.description:
Create is disabled - use default test portfolio only.
Returns the default portfolio.

schema.title: Response Create Paper Portfolio Api Paper Portfolios Post

patch.description: Update a paper trading portfolio (name, etc.).

schema.title: Response Update Paper Portfolio Api Paper Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Patch

delete.description: Delete a paper trading portfolio. Only allowed if portfolio has no open positions or accounts with balance.

schema.title: Response Delete Paper Portfolio Api Paper Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Delete

post.description:
Cleanup extra portfolios - keeps only one default test portfolio.
Transfers all positions and balances to the default portfolio.

schema.title: Response Cleanup Portfolios Api Paper Portfolios Cleanup Post

post.description:
Convert currency from one type to another (e.g., USD to BTC, BTC to ETH).
For test mode - simulates currency conversion.

schema.title: Response Convert Currency Api Paper Convert Post

get.description:
Get paper trading account balances for the authenticated user.
Balances are distinct per portfolio (enforced by portfolio_id FK).
Also calculates and logs portfolio total value including positions.

schema.title: Response Get Paper Balances Api Paper Balances Get
Response Paper Deposit Api Paper Deposit Post
Response Paper Withdraw Api Paper Withdraw Post

get.description:
List open paper trading positions for the authenticated user.
Returns positions with stop-loss and take-profit prices.

schema.title: Response List Positions Api Paper Positions Get

patch.description:
Update stop-loss price for a position (used for dynamic trailing stops).
This allows the frontend to update trailing stops without executing a trade.

schema.title: Response Update Position Stop Loss Api Paper Positions  Position Id  Stop Loss Patch

patch.description:
Update the strategy_id for a position, allowing users to change which strategy a position belongs to.
This is useful when a user has multiple strategies trading the same stock.

schema.title: Response Update Position Strategy Api Paper Positions  Position Id  Strategy Patch
Response Reset Paper Api Paper Reset Post
Response Execute Paper Trade Api Paper Trade Post

post.description:
Sell all open positions in a portfolio, converting everything to USD/fiat.
Uses slippage simulation for each position.
Only sells positions belonging to the specified portfolio (enforced by portfolio_id filter).

schema.title: Response Sell All Positions Api Paper Portfolios  Portfolio Id  Sell All Post
Response List Strategies Api Strategies  Get
Response Create Strategy Api Strategies  Post
Response Update Strategy Api Strategies  Strategy Id  Patch

delete.description: Delete a strategy only when all open positions for it are closed.

schema.title: Response Delete Strategy Api Strategies  Strategy Id  Delete
Response List Trade Logs Api Strategies Logs Get

get.description:
Compute performance stats over recent trade logs for the user.
- avg_roi: mean of per-trade ROI (realized or unrealized if available)
- std/variance: dispersion of ROI
- mse/mape: if trade logs include expected_return (from strategy/confidence),
  compute MSE/MAPE between expected_return and realized_roi.
Get health status of the trading worker
